website_summaries.verdict: Best little grill that makes everything from burgers to breakfasts fast. Lightweight and easy to move from place to place, from picnicking to tailgating.
cons: May not get hot enough for some users
Might have to season with oil before first use and thereafter
Drain catch may not stay in place after use

customer_reviews.title: Great stove. You have to season the grill before ...
customer_reviews.text: Great stove. You have to season the grill before using. I recommend flax seed oil and putting in the oven. I followed instructions to a 'T' but because the burners don't heat evenly, the cooking service didn't have a consistent conditioning on it. On about the 3rd heat/cool cycle I turned on the oven to 500 degrees applied flax seed oil and heated it up in there. The last picture was after 3 cycles and you can see that the whole cooking surface didn't get conditioned. Get flax seed oil and follow instructions, but use the oven
customer_reviews.author: es5150

customer_reviews.title: Very easy. We got to our destination
customer_reviews.text: Received it the day before our camping trip this weekend. We bought the 2 burner. Followed the instructions on seasoning the griddle. Very easy. We got to our destination. First morning made breakfast on it. Pan sausage and eggs. Had 24 sausage patties on it at once. Cooked them just right but also quickly. Scrambled eggs on it. About a dozen all at once. Turned out great. Later that evening we did burgers. I had 14 burgers going at once. Very efficient. Easy to clean. Just just pour water on it while it’s hot. Everything comes right off! Best thing we’ve added to our camper. Could be used at home also. I think it’s a great product.
customer_reviews.author: Nate

customer_reviews.title: Best $ ever spent on a cooking appliance
customer_reviews.text: This little gizmo infuses everything we cook on it with the most incredible flavor! Super easy to use, nice and portable too. Once the seasoning is complete on the griddle... it becomes nearly like teflon, even scrambled eggs don't stick! We take it camping and we use it at home on the patio, everything we cook on it is a flavorful treat! Could not be happier with the Blackstone Griddle!!!
customer_reviews.author: Pixie

customer_reviews.title: I love this grill
customer_reviews.text: I love this grill. The attached pictures shown are all from the first use. I seasoned it with a little oil and threw bacon on for good measure. My dog thanked me! Then came peppers and onions and squash. By the time I cooked the chicken the grill was perfectly seasoned. I bought the zip up carrying case and took the grill to the beach where we cooked bacon, sausage, French toast, shrimp, steak, hash browns, and onions. My husband said it was the best grill ever. I also have a Weber and I swear I like this little grill even better!
customer_reviews.author: S. Thomas

customer_reviews.title: Bad customer service.
customer_reviews.text: Purchased a 22 inch griddle after a couple of times of use it warped. The griddle rocks up and down when using it. Contacted blackstone after a couple of emails almost 3 months later they got back to me. I was told after providing pictures that it was the smallest warping they have ever seen. Try to take a picture of warpage on this griddle is tough to distinguish but she could tell by the pictures. Rude and unprofessional. They told me to put a couple of washers under it. This griddle warped within 2 weeks of use not 2 years so that tells me they have no interest in standing behind there products.
customer_reviews.author: john d maier

customer_reviews.title: Warped griddle top, doesn’t work with hose to propane tanks
customer_reviews.text: griddle top warped and will not equalize, makes it very difficult to keep oil on the top without it running off. Warped so bad eggs and other things runoff towards the sides and back and the drip slot. Will not work well with the hose adapter to a BBQ propane tank, will not stay lit and or has a very low flame even on high. One bright spot is that with the small propane tanks for lanterns it works ok grilling things like burgers and bacon and it cleans easily.
customer_reviews.author: John Kelly

customer_reviews.title: Not recommended for camping.
customer_reviews.text: We liked the quick lighting of the grill, but despise the fact that it rusts after cooking. Even with scrubbing with Brillo pads, it does not cleanup well. If I could send it back for a refund, I would. I do not know if it has a warranty, but I would not recommend this grill.
customer_reviews.author: Ruth Lamb

customer_reviews.title: There was a decent flame that was produced but it seems like the grill top itself sits to high off the ...
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this to use with a quick connect line from my RV. It's compact size and promise of performance got my interest. However, upon using this grill, it never got hot enough to cook anything other than some eggs. There was a decent flame that was produced but it seems like the grill top itself sits to high off the flame and thus never get's that hot.
customer_reviews.author: Charles D. McKenrick

customer_reviews.title: Love this griddle!
customer_reviews.text: Cooking for groups got a whole lot easier! Huge fan of this product. I use the griddle almost every weekend for basecamp outdoor cooking! Easy to clean and cook! Perfect for anything from bacon to tacos. Well controlled temperature for slower or high heat cooking. Felt like a professional taco stand!
customer_reviews.author: Peter F

customer_reviews.title: It’s ok but I’d try another brand...
customer_reviews.text: I bought one a little while back and used it once and the griddle bulged up in the middle which made difficult to cook on so I sent it back and they replaced it with another one and it did the same thing. I guess I’m going to keep it because it’s portable and we cook a lot while camping and it’s compact but being a Blackstone I’m pretty disappointed in the product, not the company because they did replace it and probably would do it again but I don’t feel like messing with all that again. I should have purchased a different brand after sending it back the first time.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The Perfict add on for outdoor cooking!
customer_reviews.text: used Crisbee Stik Original Cast Iron Seasoning Oil & Conditioner - Plant Based Oils With Beeswax for the seasoning. worked like a charm! now my cook top is 100% Black and totally non stick!
customer_reviews.author: Micro

customer_reviews.title: Rough Surface and not hot enough. I threw it out.
customer_reviews.text: I was disappointed with the rough surface of the grill. It was anything but smooth. I never could get the thing to properly season even though I watched all the YouTube videos and tried several times. Everything I cooked just stuck. The grill definitely had a bad problem with hot and cold spots. I threw the the thing out at the end of the 1st outdoor season!!! I think the burner just isn't hot enough to work well. I usually don't leave negative reviews but this thing just stunk. A good cast iron skillet on a wood fire worked much better than lugging this thing around.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: They work, but not worth buying.
customer_reviews.text: These headphones work, but they lack many sound quality options. Stuck in "phone quality mode!" These head phones really lack in most qualities I want in headphones. To start with they have a microphone. I really don't want, or need, a microphone on my headphones. It's a stupid feature in headphones. These headphones default to "phone quality" audio on my computer. Really "phone quality" in the 21st Century?. I think I can override that setting, but why should I have to jump through hoops to get better than "telephone quality" bit rates?
customer_reviews.author: Frank D.

customer_reviews.title: Griddle = Fun!
customer_reviews.text: My brother and I each own these now - and they are great. They work great in warm weather and pretty well in cold weather as well. It is fun to griddle up meats and pancakes and philly cheesestaks; you can also fry or scramble eggs in a pan on this griddle - just a very fun addition to the camping gear or to the deck or porch. Bacon is really best fried outdoors - keep all that smoke and grease out of your house - and let the spatter be outdoors as well - and it is fun to griddle out in the outdoors, too.
customer_reviews.author: Barry J Bolling

customer_reviews.title: This was awesome at first. Then it sucked.
customer_reviews.text: This was great for the first few months but after awhile the seasoned surfaced flakes. Short of sandblasting the surface and starting from scratch you are left with a worthless surface to cook on.
customer_reviews.author: Roscoe

customer_reviews.title: Great addition to our RV
customer_reviews.text: This was a great product for our RV kitchen. you can cook enough food for several people at the same time. Pros- Great quality Much better grease trap than the smaller Blackstone grill Cons- VERY HEAVY. The smaller size is much lighter. Not crazy about the propane bottle connection. IT sticks out just begging to get damaged. It does not come with the connection to attach it to the RV quick disconnect If you intend to store it in some kind of bag, rethink it because it is so heavy it will tear up a bag. find some sort of plastic container. Youtube the cleaning/seasoning procedure to prevent damage to your grill.
customer_reviews.author: JLSmith

customer_reviews.title: Great appliance, but I was expecting slightly different cooking capabilities.
customer_reviews.text: Overall really great cooking appliance. It is a lot heavier than anticipated so portability is quite low unless you plan to keep it in vehicle transport or fold up hand truck. Although thoughful design wa smade to reduce warping, i found that oil wants to run to the walls so it seems to get more stuck food and over oiling the groddle. I was expecting being able to cook teppanyaki, the steel top is not polished smooth, but more like an iron skillet texture. I need to find a cooking utensil that is good for moving oil from edge back to the cooking area.
customer_reviews.author: Angela Li

customer_reviews.title: Great portable grill for camping
customer_reviews.text: I bought this 22" griddle almost 4 months to the day. First of all I'd like to say I love it. I use it at least twice a week, sometime more. However....after using i noticed the griddle is starting to warp. Hence the 1 star. I have no idea why it's began to warp and over time is getting worse. it has like a hill in the middle of the griddle and any oil or juices go to the side. Looks like it only has a 90 day warranty. so i guess i'm out of luck!
customer_reviews.author: Carol P

customer_reviews.title: Lower quality than expected
customer_reviews.text: Decent griddle build quality overall fit and finish was under par especially in the fit and finish was expecting better quality the drip pan doesn't seat all the way in just kinda hangs there the bottom peace of sheet metal was warped right out of the box and it doesn't come close to heating evenly it does however have plenty of heat wouldn't say its a bad griddle but expected better quality after reading there site and reviews was thinking of buying the big model figured i would try this first now i am not so certain whole point of a griddle for me is flat surface with even heat this didn't provide the ladder
customer_reviews.author: Michelle

customer_reviews.title: Where have you been all my life?
customer_reviews.text: I love this griddle. I used to use nothing but non stick electric griddles because I did not know that something like this existed. I saw someone using one of these at a campground and the lightbulb went off. Once it is properly seasoned it is just as non-stick as the ones with the stupid coating, but it is way more durable. You can use metal utensils on it. There are some spots that are colder, but once you learn them it is easy to use them to your advantage (transferring food to the hotter parts or cooler parts based on what you need). I love this thing and I will never give it up.
customer_reviews.author: Brandon Jenkins

customer_reviews.title: Wow!
customer_reviews.text: I hardly ever write reviews. I’m so stoked and in awe with this griddle. I also bought the hood and the bulk hose adapter. I’m a widow. My late husband always cooked outside. I knew I needed something to cook outside, in the event I lost power. I decided to buy Blackstone 22” based on positive reviews and Utube channels. I knew I wanted two burners...one side to cook on and the other side to heat something like water. I’m not disappointed....I’ve cooked bacon, peppers and onions, pizza, burgers and steak. Easy to cook on and easy to clean up. I highly recommend this griddle.
customer_reviews.author: TX78626

customer_reviews.title: Good Griddle for RV Life
customer_reviews.text: This unit deserves a 5 🌟 rating but the questions were answered truthfully. 1 heat distribution is good from the H pattern burners. But not great. 2 portability... This sucker weighs a ton. The gas connection seems oddly placed. But it's just what I wanted in a RV camp griddle. 3 easy to clean... It's a griddle! The grease cup is okay but arrived with the clips to secure it broken off. But I utilized a couple of pop robots and re-attached that quickly. Otherwise I like the griddle since it appears to be as tough as steel. Shipping something that heasy is bound to encounter some serious bumping and bruising.
customer_reviews.author: Taptheknowledge

customer_reviews.title: This is Awesome!
customer_reviews.text: I picked it up to make cheese steaks on it, but I've found that I use it for almost everything. It's so easy to clean and with the size work space, compared to pans, I've basically stopped using pan. Mine gets use almost everyday. If I were a homebuilder or if I did renovations, I will absolutely have a griddle built into the kitchen. For now, this works very very well. If you're wondering why I didn't give it 5 starts is because my griddle top isn't completely flat. It's not bad enough that I wanted to return it, but it's enough that I have trouble scraping it clean with a griddle scraper.
customer_reviews.author: crabjoe

customer_reviews.title: Getting rusty
customer_reviews.text: When we first purchased the griddle 1 year ago, it seemed to heat well. Twelve months later the griddle is not getting hot enough to cook. Yesterday I couldn’t get it to even sauté onions. The most disappointing feature is that the griddle has severely rusted in the twelve months we’ve had it, despite proper maintenance and keeping it covered. We do live close to the Gulf shore and know things rust a little quicker, but the surface area of the griddle has rusted quicker than one would expect. We are now looking for something to replace the griddle.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth G. Radke

customer_reviews.title: Great RV addition
customer_reviews.text: Seasoning went great and it's now my primary cook stove. Only problem I've encountered (happens with any outdoor cooking stove) is the wind. If it's a windy day, I use my indoor kitchen. Wind keeps flames from heating the cooking surface so I don't even try. I used Flax Seed Oil to season it, and cooking breakfast on the griddle for the first time went flawlessly. I bought the cover and the carry bag combo along with the spatula and bottle set, and I'm really glad I did. This is a great stove and makes cooking out a pleasure.
customer_reviews.author: RSPPRODINC

customer_reviews.title: A must have for the RV
customer_reviews.text: Watched a fellow camper use his and knew I had to have one! We travel full time in our RV. This is now my outdoor go to cooking device! I haven’t brought out my charcoal or gas grill in over two months! Easy to set up and level. Very easy to clean. I added the storage bag and tools to finish this out as well as a folding outdoor table. I suggest buying the hose converter that allows you to connect to a large propane tank or your RV directly. I’m hooked on this brand! I just grilled steaks while placing corn on the cob around the outside edges. Everything cooked evenly with the steaks nice and juicy
customer_reviews.author: Deborah L Reed

customer_reviews.title: absolutely love it. 😊
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love it and I have cooked hamburgers on it a couple of times grilled chicken Chinese fried rice with egg. quesadillas even bacon. The mini propane tank last about two uses. highly recommend getting a spatula suitable for cleaning it is important to scrape it as you go to prevent food from sticking as you are cooking do not use too high of a cooking heat in the beginning until you get used to the machine and definitely WASH! your grill top only once and dry very well before seasoning. YouTube is helpful.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t light
customer_reviews.text: Grill will not light, have had many Weber, Coleman, etc grills over the years all worked when delivered. But this Blackstone will not light....thanks a lot.
customer_reviews.author: J. Douglas

customer_reviews.title: I have fallen in love with this awesome griddle
customer_reviews.text: I have fallen in love with this awesome griddle... I take it out onto the back porch and can cook a whole pack of bacon, no smell or grease in the house .. I've made shrimp fried rice, steaks ... I know my neighbors are drooling 🤤
customer_reviews.author: Cris Spurlock

customer_reviews.title: Good size for home or away
customer_reviews.text: I got this for backyard use and for potential emergency use (I live in earthquake country). Unit works well with 1lb bottle as shipped. I bought adapter hose for larger tanks which I recommend. The removable top is heavy gauge steel - very robust. Be patient seasoning the top - it takes several applications of oil and really just cooking on it will do the trick best. Heating is not perfectly even across the surface but it is well within acceptable range. Some might prefer it so some foods can be moved to the edges for less intense heat. I'm pleased with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: RickH

customer_reviews.title: We love our Blackstone Grill!
customer_reviews.text: We love this grill and have been using it for years as a camp stove. We cook everything from breakfast foods like eggs, bacon, and pancakes, to meals like grilled chicken, burgers, salmon, mixed vegetables, and even use it to toast breads. It has become seasoned and cooks everything to perfection. The heat is well distributed and we can scrape away the grease and crumbs into the grease trap drawer. It's compact, durable, and easy to clean. We definitely recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: E&C

customer_reviews.title: The best!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love this thing! Cook on it is fantastic once you get a handle on it. The hot spot is obviously in the middle where the burner is. Heat is distributed throughout but the middle is the hottest by far. Once you figure out and strategize where you want to cook and sear everything, this thing is a breeze. Easy to clean and should last a long time with proper care. Assembly literally takes two minutes and you're off and running. Sturdy, but doesnt weigh a ton, making it easy to move around. Would buy again and again!
customer_reviews.author: Sean M Croft

customer_reviews.title: Well made and great customer service.
customer_reviews.text: Great griddle. Purchased this in August but was back ordered until mid October. The grill arrived one month early. Nice surprise. Easy to put together and season. I used flax seed and olive oils. After seasoning, the regulator went out on me. Contacted Blackstone customer service and was promptly sent out a new replacement. Great customer service by Blackstone. Cooking on the 22" griddle is pure joy. I added a lp hose to run off a 20 pound tank and purchased the Blackstone spatulas and steamer lid...you really need them to get the most out of griddle cooking. The 22" Blackstone griddle is well made with a heavy flat steel top that makes perfect burgers and pancakes. Enjoy!
customer_reviews.author: Brian Nylander

customer_reviews.title: Great little griddle!
customer_reviews.text: I have bought 2 of these . they each easily feed 10 people . It was easy to season it takes about an hour and seasons completely if you allow the appropriate time to season it. Cooking surface heats evenly from center out allowing for items that cook off early can be placed on the edge and stay warm. I have cooked over a griddle for years a chimp can use this thing it’s so easy. Recommended for emergencies too.
customer_reviews.author: D

customer_reviews.title: Good heat distribution an easy cleanup
customer_reviews.text: Just decided I just decided to use this Grill today April 5th. I followed the seasoning directions and then started to cook. The heat distribution is perfect! I cooked 2 lb of chicken thighs in less than 15 minutes. I left the heat on for 10 more minutes to make the clean up easier. The food particles scraped off into the grease pocket 4 easy throw away. This is an awesome product, a great Grill for the money. Well worth it. Also bought the covers for it for another $17.
customer_reviews.author: memere d

customer_reviews.title: Awesome portable griddle, perfect for picnicing or tailgating
customer_reviews.text: The Blackstone griddle has been great addition to our household. We probably don't use it as often as we would like but for the times that we have used it, it's been perfect. Build quality: Surprisingly, it's built well and very sturdy even though it's made in China. Ease of use: Very simple to setup, should take you less than 5 minutes from unpacking, hooking up the portable propane to lighting it up. Cleaning is a breeze if you are familiar with handling cast iron products. Do make sure that you season the griddle well before using it. I would recommend purchasing a propane adaptor to fit a 20 lb propane tank if you use it often.
customer_reviews.author: Son P.

customer_reviews.title: It is fanastic, but don't throw away your covered grill just yet
customer_reviews.text: I do love this griddle it is perfect for making a big breakfast. thinner burgers and steaks. I've had a problem trying to cook large sausages and thicker cut steaks or burgers, especially if it's a bit windy or cold. Since it doesn't use a hood or cover on it, heat isn't trapped. Also it goes through a green bottle of camping grill propane in no time flat. But it's a winner in the big breakfast department. But I'm going to have to find a place in the camper for the old Coleman grill too.
customer_reviews.author: Sean Slifer

customer_reviews.title: Good, but everything sticks!
customer_reviews.text: We bought this for camping. We were super excited to use it the first time. We dumped a couple cans of corned beef hash onto the flat top and let that baby go... 10 min later it was stuck to the flat top and wouldn’t budge. Overall it really is a great concept and it works good and we use it a lot, just make sure to spray the heck out of it or oil it real good before you use it, each time
customer_reviews.author: Tiffany L.

customer_reviews.title: Great Griddle
customer_reviews.text: We got this for our RV. It is portable, but a bit heavier than I excepted. We have cooked a variety of foods on it, but our favorite are smash burgers! It's not as easy to clean as many videos lead you to believe, but it's not too terribly bad either. For the most part, food doesn't stick, however sometimes it's hard to get the residue cleaned off. Overall, we are happy with the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Paul T.

customer_reviews.title: BUY IT!
customer_reviews.text: Lifelong camper, here. Always relied on the fire or the Coleman two-burner. Holy crap, have I been missing out! This puppy seasons right up and just does an amazing job cooking. I use it at home ALL OF THE TIME. It's better than my grill, better than my stove. Everything I could ask for in a cooking surface - and it's for the woods. If anything happens to this one, I'll be buying another immediately.
customer_reviews.author: MPWintermute

customer_reviews.title: Excellent griddle
customer_reviews.text: This is the perfect size for almost any occasion for a single family. You can take it with you camping or you can put it on a table on your porch. 22" is more than enough space to cook most any meal for an average size family. I would suggest that you also buy the hard cover that is available as well. I really enjoy cooking on this as much as my larger Blackstone griddle. Highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Bruce Clark

customer_reviews.title: A MUST HAVE for any campsite or Single person
customer_reviews.text: These are Incredible. Revolutionized our camping menu and have a 36" at Home which inspired it. Get one, you'll love it. HINT: Scrub all the shipping oil off of ALL of the surfaces with HOT soapy water before seasoning. You're welcome ;-)
customer_reviews.author: WinU

customer_reviews.title: everything worked better than I expected
customer_reviews.text: Used in conjunction with a 20 Gal propane tank, I purchased the adapter hose separately, everything worked better than I expected. I used this for camping and even with 10MPH constant wind I cooked all weekend and it stayed hot and cooked well. The grill does have hot spots as other reviewers have mentioned. I like this because, for example I will cook a fried egg next to a warm spot while I cook a burger in the hot spot. I was genuinely very surprised it worked so well and its very sturdy, easy to assemble and durable. Would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: CHASE NELSON

customer_reviews.title: Ready for hurricane Irma.
customer_reviews.text: My husband and I own a small RV park in South Carolina. I ordered this griddle so we would have it just in case we needed it if we lost power due to hurricane Irma. I immediately took it out of the box and read the directions on how to season it before use. It was so simple and took no time. Even though we are still waiting to see where Irma will head I just had to try the new griddle out today. I cooked two really nice rib eyes and we were extremely pleased. Clean up was a breeze (less than five minutes). I'm ready for you Irma.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Couldn't be happier with this product
customer_reviews.text: Couldn't be happier with this product. I was looking for a decent camp grill and could not find any with good reviews for a decent price. This thing popped up and I saw all the positive reviews, looked it up on youtube and saw all the food people were making on it and decided to give it a try. Took it camping this weekend and used it for the first time and it was awesome. Cooked bacon, hash browns, eggs, skirt steak, onions, mushrooms, and garlic and everything turned out really good. Easy to use, east to clean, easy to store. Will likely get the 36" next, highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: SeeWhyyy

customer_reviews.title: Great little grill!!!
customer_reviews.text: I like everything about this grill. I seasoned it 3 times and may do it more. 1...The used price I got it for. 2...boxed good..no damage 3...easy to assemble 4...heats fast and even 5...grill surface did not warp under high heat. 6...grease container is simple, well positioned, good size and easy to unhook and clean 7...it took the seasoning well...no sticking. I really can’t think of anything I don’t like about it.
customer_reviews.author: IP

customer_reviews.title: Heavy duty cast iron top, extremely portable.
customer_reviews.text: This is the review you're looking for: I knew what I was getting before I purchased this. A friend of mine has this exact same unit. What I like most is the heavy duty cast iron top that distributes the heat evenly. Once you cure the top, nothing sticks to it. I even take this top off and put it on my open flame burner and cook street tacos on it all day with a big propane bottle.
customer_reviews.author: ArgentX

customer_reviews.title: Good Alternative to BBQ for RV
customer_reviews.text: Many on the RV chats I monitor had recommended this as a space-saver instead of carrying a big/heavy BBQ. I bought it and am glad I did. More versatile and indeed smaller/lighter. True - it is a griddle only - not technically a grill, but my burgers and steak came out fine. Like cast iron it must be seasoned, but there is a good online video from the company on how to do this.
customer_reviews.author: M. Guerin

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful, simple, substantial, and reasonably priced!
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful, simple, substantial, and reasonably priced. This is one of my favorite all time buys on Amazon. I did quite a lot of research on this and competing griddles for picnics or car camping. I also purchased the Blackstone Griddle Carry Bag. I purchased this three and a half months ago for my daughter's birthday picnic, and could not keep away from it -- looking for every excuse to use this. We just recently used this to go car camping with a bunch of friends. We treated them to a wonderful breakfast from this griddle.
customer_reviews.author: Mel C. Labrador

customer_reviews.title: This is great
customer_reviews.text: I love this griddle. I set it on top of my electric stove and it vents through the hood. I have cooked everything on it and it turned out great! Definitely condition it outside as it will smoke a lot. After it’s conditioned you’re good to go. Uses about 1 propane gallon for every three times I’ve used it. Clean up is super easy and there’s a small catch basket in the back to empty. Definitely a good buy
customer_reviews.author: Mick

customer_reviews.title: Camping necessity!
customer_reviews.text: I used it for every meal while camping over the weekend. Made tacos, fajitas with green peppers & onions, bacon, sausage, eggs, hash browns & diced potatoes. Bought with the Zenware 3 piece set & enjoyed both. Important to follow the directions for seasoning the griddle. If you do that, you will have very little issues with food sticking to the surface. I also used a 10 foot extension for use on a 20lb propane tank.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great blackstone grill!
customer_reviews.text: I'm pleased with this blackstone grill. I have the bigger 4 burner for home use. This one is a must for Rv'ers or car campers! Easy to clean if u know what u doing. Works as should. Highly recommend for rvs like I said.
customer_reviews.author: NealBK

customer_reviews.title: Must have for camping or tailgating
customer_reviews.text: I was a little hesitant to jump on the “BlackStone Bandwagon” but I’m glad we did. It does what it should and performs great after properly “seasoning” the griddle. The only down side to this is how much propane it uses. I will go through a 1lb bottle per day while camping, and that’s only 2 meals. Either buy the adapter hose for a larger tank or refill your bottles like I do. I would buy again and maybe the larger version
customer_reviews.author: Bwilson

customer_reviews.title: Easy, convenient, portable!
customer_reviews.text: I seasoned it right away - easy to do! Cooked some sausage on it right after, quick and easy. I like that you can cut right on the surface and not worry about damaging it. Heat distribution isn’t completely even but knowing where the burners are located allowed for moving items to the side when ‘doneness’ is achieved. Cleanup is a breeze. I foresee many delicious meals to come. Portable, but not light!
customer_reviews.author: LG286

customer_reviews.title: This Blackstone Gas Changed Our Camping Life!
customer_reviews.text: I cannot tell you how often i say "I love my Blackstone!" It has completely changed the way we cook when camping. We no loner carry a Coleman Camp Stove and portable grill. The Blackstone has replaced both of them. Our menu has become much more diverse as the Blackstone is so versatile. I can cook multiple items at the same time and cleanup is a snap. I plan on buying one for the house as well after our summer travels are over.
customer_reviews.author: Gregory M. Urroz

customer_reviews.title: It will cost you more money than it’s worth with the ruined food.
customer_reviews.text: The blackstone grill does not light when you try to ignite. And when you do get it started it does not stay lit. I bought this and the stand for over 200 and I have already ruined 100 in steak and i cannot return the grill.
customer_reviews.author: CJ Capurso

customer_reviews.title: Full refund not issued
customer_reviews.text: Seller did not issue me a full refund on my return. Don’t do business with this seller. If you have to return a defective product you will only get a partial refund. Buyers beware
customer_reviews.author: DaGuy

customer_reviews.title: Make sure you follow the directions about seasoning your grill before use.
customer_reviews.text: The grill is great. Seasoned the grill per directions. We have cooked some amazing meals on the grill. I always clean with water after cooking. Then apply cooking oil and wipe the grill down. The grill lights perfectly. I purchased the top cover for ours. The grill can get extremely hot with the cover closed. Sometimes you light one burner and leave the other side cold. I have purchased the optional adapter to allow us to run the grill on our R.V. propane supply. I purchased a brand new propane grill like the one that came with our R.V. I will probably stop carrying it. The Blackstone is all we ever use now.
customer_reviews.author: Terry

customer_reviews.title: Makes the best burgers I've ever had
customer_reviews.text: Makes the best burgers I've ever had! Fries them crispy on the outside and just perfect on the inside. We've only used it for burgers, so I don't know about cooking anything else on it, but I think whatever you use it for will be delicious. Very easy to clean with the pull-out drippings tray. The top portion comes off so you can clean it and not worry about getting any of the electronic components wet. That's a real plus, unlike an electric skillet that has to be carefully washed. Make sure you season it before use, follow the manufacturers directions on that.
customer_reviews.author: Reddog

customer_reviews.title: Very good griddle
customer_reviews.text: While we did not end up getting our griddle from Amazon due to a supplier issue, we did get one elsewhere. We have had it about 10 months and use it a few times per week. It has been fine so far. Most likely my occasional poor cooking results are due to me still learning how to cook different things on a griddle rather than on a grill. Would recommend buying one.
customer_reviews.author: mrestar

customer_reviews.title: Griddle top is not flat horrible quality !!!!
customer_reviews.text: Thought it would be a lot better quality than what I got ! Reviews looked decent but when it arrived and I pulled the griddle top out I notice it was far from flat . It has a big hump in the middle and the edges where it’s bent up are horribly Bowed ! Crap not happy with the quality at all.
customer_reviews.author: john

customer_reviews.title: Perfect size cooking for two
customer_reviews.text: I looked at these for a while and found it hard to decide on the size. I picked the small one because of the H burner. It works perfectly. If you are cooking for more than two people, get a bigger grill. The cooking surface seasoned very well, I coated it with canola and turned the removable surface upside down and seasoned it on my BBQ grill. I have used it several times already and the heat distribution is great.
customer_reviews.author: w earp

customer_reviews.title: Wanted to love this grill. Underperforming so far.
customer_reviews.text: Wanted to love this grill. But it consistently does not get hot enough camping to even cook our eggs. On line it says the regulator has a safety on it that if you turn the propane on to quickly the safety restricts the flow. Maybe I have a bad regulator but so far this grill has under performed. Contacted black stone. Will update with the results.
customer_reviews.author: Movie Guy

customer_reviews.title: BEST PURCHASE MADE IN A LONG TIME! Just buy it! You won’t regret it!
customer_reviews.text: We absolutely love our Blackstone!! We use it almost every night during the week and every weekend! We are able to cook an entire meal at a fraction of the time it would take to cook it inside, and it tastes so much better on the Blackstone! Can’t speak highly enough about it! Do yourself a favor and just buy it!! You won’t regret it!
customer_reviews.author: LG

customer_reviews.title: Cooks great!
customer_reviews.text: This thing works great! But its biggest pro is also its biggest con i think. The cook top is heavy and thick and cooks amazing. Seasons and cooks just like a good iron griddle. I love it. But because its thick and heavy it also take a bit to get hot and takes forever to cool down. You cant just take it out cook and get back on the road in a reasonable amount of time. Other than that its great, it cooks really good and heats pretty even. Also does not take up much room and the cover i ordered for it fits great and is really nice and durable.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph T.

customer_reviews.title: HEAVY!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great grill flat top we love it. We hate that it's so heavy. We are going to retire this to our patio as a failed RV experiment and find a more portable unit. Does it cook great, Yes, but when the wind is blowing No. They make metal side plates to block the wind which cost $$$. A trip to a local box store, 3 metal plates and magnets helped block the wind. The plates should have been included with the product.
customer_reviews.author: Richard Roberts

customer_reviews.title: I love this thing. Go bigger if you’re not camping
customer_reviews.text: Unless you’re cooking with wood or charcoal, I see no reason to have a gas grill. The griddle does everything and more. Two minor complaints. I had a problem with the LP regulator but I called customer support and she explained how to fix it no problem. Open the LP tank slowly. The second issue, GO BIG. 22” is good but my next will be the 36”. However, the 22” will be great for camping.
customer_reviews.author: JJacobson

customer_reviews.title: Great grill
customer_reviews.text: My husband and I wanted a small grill. I have read reviews on grill made by this company that were great. After using the grill for the first time we have to say we love it! He cooler a couple steaks and a couple hot dogs on it with room for more food. Head was distributed, clean up was easy. We are very pleased with this product.
customer_reviews.author: Judy wilson

customer_reviews.title: Can't wait to use it!
customer_reviews.text: So excited to use this! Did as previous reviewer suggested, Evenly coated with flax seed oil, baked at 450 in oven for 1 hour 3 times completely cooling in-between an this is how it looks. It seasoned completely evenly. after use shall adjust the stars.
customer_reviews.author: Laura Simpson

customer_reviews.title: Super fast Delivery
customer_reviews.text: Said wasn't going to be delivered until Aug 18-25, well it arrived the 12th which was awesome as I was getting ready for a camping trip and wanted to take it with. Opened it up no damage to the product everything looked great. Has specific instructions on how to season the Griddle. Will update once I have the chance to use on my camping trip.
customer_reviews.author: Craig

customer_reviews.title: Love my Blackstone!
customer_reviews.text: This grill is so awesome!! Have used it many times now and it never disappoints. Have purchased the lid and now the base for it to sit in giving us a little more room. We had also purchased the line for the propane tank instead of using the little tanks. What a great great grill!! VERY happy with this purchase!!
customer_reviews.author: Chris E

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality control
customer_reviews.text: Just received the 22" griddle. Unit is tweaked. One rivet holding the front to the side is barely holding, the second rivet is flopping in the breeze, never made it through the second hole. One of the two controls grinds when I turn it. Very dissapointed. UPDATE: Blackstone contacted me via email and requested pictures. Just received a replacement from Blackstone. I look forward to joining the rest of the happy Blackstone customers. Updated to 5 stars for making it right.
customer_reviews.author: Kurt Obermeier

customer_reviews.title: Nice Grill
customer_reviews.text: I really like my grill. I seasoned it with the Flauv oil as recommended. Only thing to mention to buyers is that when opening your gas valve. OPEN VERY slowly. If you hear a click, you need to close the valve back and wait 10 minutes or so and then reopen very slowly so you don't pop the regulator. Works great and I recommend the table that this sits on.
customer_reviews.author: Nick C.

customer_reviews.title: Great grill for the price
customer_reviews.text: Well constructed. Easy to set up and use. Make sure you season the cooking surface first to remove any potential steel taste. Picked this up in comments from other purchasers. That said, a 5 star product. Great for informal cookouts. We used it for our boating group outing and cooked hamburgers and hot dogs for 30 people on it. ( obviously not all at once ) . It maintained its heat well, the drip feature functioned perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Bill M

customer_reviews.title: EXCELLENT PRODUCT!
customer_reviews.text: Once I received this product I went ahead and seasoned the grill right away and began using. The more I use it the better and better everything tastes on it. My fried rice and things as simple as grilled cheese or just amazingly better in taste and text year. I would suggest purchasing the optional propane attachment and holes for use at home. The portable propane tanks you buy at Walmart don’t last very long but are great for camping. One small tank would probably last two or three sessions. Also if you live in a humid area make sure you oil your grill after every use or else it will rust. Carrying case is also great.
customer_reviews.author: Richie T

customer_reviews.title: Awesome camp cooking solution!  Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Don’t know how I didn’t discover this til now??!! I’ve grown up with a camp chef stove and they’re great for what they are... a heat source. However, you still have to lug around your cooking surfaces, etc. which can be cumbersome. With a cooking surface built in, I don’t need to carry around too much anymore unless I really want a skillet/pot for a trip. This solution accomplishes 90% of my needs. I also recommend the storage/carry bag!
customer_reviews.author: ceempham

customer_reviews.title: Love this little griddle!
customer_reviews.text: Love this little griddle! We bought this for camping and it works great. Very convenient and easy to move. The heating distribution is pretty even though you do get a few hotspots. I think that’s to be expected. Make sure you season your grill before you use it... It makes clean up pretty easy.
customer_reviews.author: PPResident

customer_reviews.title: this thing is awesome. makes cooking a snap and easy
customer_reviews.text: Arrived just in time for our big wall tent setup for this year's Elk hunting camp. this thing is awesome. makes cooking a snap and easy. was able to cook multiple things at once instead of cook something in a pan...then set it aside so it could get cold...then cook something else....etc. easy to use. easy to clean. came back yesterday to buy the carry bag w/ it. It's portable enough w/ out the bag, but it definitely needs it and i know it'll make it that much better. buy this w/ confidence. it's a great purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Rodney F.

customer_reviews.title: Best Amazon purchase to date!!!!
customer_reviews.text: By far the best purchase to date on Amazon. I love this griddle. All the money I wasted on electric griddles, should have bought this sooner. Griddle temp is well over 500 degrees (infrared thermometer coming tomorrow/highly recommended). This griddle is so versatile. We are currently camping and using it but as soon as we get back home it will be one of our regular cooking appliances. Get you one!!!
customer_reviews.author: Eric Roseberry

customer_reviews.title: Good hot surface!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this griddle as we are full time RVers, and thought it would be great to, for one, cook our breakfasts outside as well as other things. We’ve only used it about three times due to much cooler here in Sierra Vista, AZ in the months of December. But we’re hoping to use much more as this year progresses. So far , so good. Now, sort of wish I had purchased the two-burner, but on second thought, no, as it would be even heavier to load and unload.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: My Wife Thinks I'm Crazy ... About this Griddle.
customer_reviews.text: Or maybe just a little overboard fanatical. We use this at home and when on outings. I have cooked burgers, steaks, bacon, hash browns, fajitas, pancakes, sausage, even chicken wings on the griddle and all taste great. I followed the manufacturer's instructions on how to season the griddle and have had to do very little in maintaining it since. When at home, I use a 4 foot hose and adapter connecting the griddle to a 20 pound tank instead of using the 1 pound green tanks. It's much less expensive this way unless you refill the small tanks.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff

customer_reviews.title: Good family of 6 capacity, love H burner style.
customer_reviews.text: I love this grill. Very versatile. Fairly sturdy frame. Well made griddle pan. Heats fairly evenly with the H style burner, I wouldn’t consider any other burner style for sure. We use it in camp and at home. I just drape a little foil over the edge to block the gap when it’s windy. Along with my old Coleman grill I can cook anything and everything in my camp kitchen on time.
customer_reviews.author: M2E2S

customer_reviews.title: Yummy!
customer_reviews.text: Our first Blackstone grill. This is a table topper grill. We bought it for our R.V. and it is much easier to cope with than a regular size grill. It cooks with propane; another good deal. The food cooks fast and it tastes very good. We also use it in our backyard for guests...JBM
customer_reviews.author: Avid Reader

customer_reviews.title: Much better deal at Walmart EVERYTHING YOU NEED!!
customer_reviews.text: Cooking on a properly seasoned griddle adds an awesome flavor to food, I love this griddle. I was actually just looking to purchase the stand for it (mine is the 17 inch) for $99.99 on amazon but I found the stand along with the bulk hose connect and lid for $149 from Walmart, oh yeah by the way it also comes with a 22 inch griddle!!!
customer_reviews.author: john c.

customer_reviews.title: Love this griddle.
customer_reviews.text: Bought to take on extended camping trips. Seasoned and practiced on deck prior to trip. Absolutely great results from breakfast, lunch and dinner! Going to replace my regular bbq grill. Added the hood and leg kit. It is a ltttle big and heavy for camping but once set up you can cook for a crowd. Several other campers going to get one now. Doubles as a great home griddle too. Eating more vegetables done on the griddle now. Enjoying trying new recipes.
customer_reviews.author: Smokeydog

customer_reviews.title: Very versatile.
customer_reviews.text: We used the griddle all weekend and absolutely love it! I seasoned it 4 times, until it was a deep brown. We went camping and used it for breakfast, lunch and dinner. The hash browns were golden and crispy. Sandwiches perfectly grilled and we cooked enough taco meat to feed us all. Cleanup is also a snap. A little oil, a flat scraper, and a clean towel was all it took and it's ready for the next meal. We bought the Blackstone tool kit and the cover/carry bag. Makes it easy to move around to camp. Next step is to modify to run off of motorhome propane system and we're good for the season.
customer_reviews.author: Jimmy r

customer_reviews.title: Blackstone makes great products at amazing prices
customer_reviews.text: This grill is fantastic at an amazing price. I used to own a Coleman tailgate grill that took longer to clean than it did to cook the food. This grill is very easy to clean and does a superior job of cooking food. I own a Blackstone 26" two burner grill that is great for my condo. This smaller grill has a rolled steel top that lifts off for cleaning. I then store my cooking utensils inside the grill and flip the steel top upside down to close in the contents. The grease tray works very well.
customer_reviews.author: TJFall

customer_reviews.title: Utterly satisfied...
customer_reviews.text: ...and somewhat thrilled with our new Blackstone 22 Inch Portable Gas Griddle. Did initial seasoning yesterday, using our kitchen oven, (the cold-rolled steel grill barely fit in there), and finished it up today out on the burners - then cooked off a pound of bacon just to kind of top off this initial run on seasoning it. (Guess who had BLTs for supper?). Cannot wait to take this rig out camping!
customer_reviews.author: D. A. Stites

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for Two
customer_reviews.text: My husband wanted a Blackstone Grill, we didn’t have Porch room for a big one nor for two people did we need a big one. When I found this one, it was the perfect size for two. It came quickly, we did all things required to season it and cooked a breakfast the next morning on it. If you like to cook outside and only two people or less, this is for you. My husband is cooking all the bacon and sausage outside which makes for a better smelling kitchen!😊 I would recommend to also purchase the protective cover.
customer_reviews.author: janice poolson

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT BUY
customer_reviews.text: Do not buy this griddle. The griddle I purchased would not get hot even though the same hose, tank and regulator worked fine on my Weber grill. In addition to this, I ordered a hood for it and it would not assemble because they used rivets on some griddles and nuts and screws on others. If you happen to get one without the screw and nut and want to add a hood, you are out of luck. In addition to this, Blackstone does not stand behind there product and they want the customer to absorb the shipping to return even though their product is defective. DO NOT BUY BLACKSTONE as they do not back up their China made product.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best purchase you will ever make
customer_reviews.text: Perfect. No other words to describe this. Screw open grate grills, this is the only way to cook. And since the top comes off, if you ever need to, take it to the car wash and let the pressure gun go to town after a long weekend of camping and feeding hungry people. I actually take mine inside and use it on my gas stove as well! Love it!
customer_reviews.author: TinyTurnips

customer_reviews.title: Its hard to beat
customer_reviews.text: I got the 22" instead of the 17". Im glad I did because it still very portatble and the few inches make a difference when you have the extra company. You can go wrong with any of these Blackstone Grills.
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: Love this griddle!
customer_reviews.text: This griddle rocks! It is IMPORTANT to follow the seasoning instructions. If you don't season it properly you will be disappointed because some food items (like eggs) will stick to the surface. There are Youtube videos on how to season. I used flaxseed oil. The more you season, the more non-stick the surface will become. The base is lightweight, but the griddle surface is heavy. Fast, easy set up. Heats up quickly. Also purchased the carrying bag since this will go on camping trips with me. So glad I bought a griddle instead of a tabletop grill.
customer_reviews.author: T

customer_reviews.title: Best cooking product
customer_reviews.text: I love this griddle. It’s a little heavy to be fully portable however it is really sturdy and cooks really well. Wish I had one years ago. I have been using this griddle for a year and it still is my number 1 go to. It stays outside year round and is standing up to elements, other then a little rust on cooking surface from a period of non use, but that was remedied with some steel wool and cooking oil.
customer_reviews.author: Lovetocook

customer_reviews.title: Grill top don’t fit.
customer_reviews.text: Just opened the box . Very disappointed. The cooking surface doesn’t fit. There is no hole for the drip pan. . This is the first time that I wanted to use it . I ordered this in September 2019. It was shipped to my Florida address. That’s why I just opened it. I also live in Michigan (snowbird) I would like the correct cook top maybe it will work. I have not put it all together. I’m so hurt .!!
customer_reviews.author: mary w.

customer_reviews.title: Well Well Well, I found my grill!
customer_reviews.text: This little powerhouse just made our camping trip so much easier. I absolutely love cooking on a flattop grill. We will buy legs for this and use as our regular home grill as well. Heats up fast and so easy to clean. I am on the lookout for a case for it. Over the moon excited about grill.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer D.

customer_reviews.title: If you even think you might want the larger model do it.
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to assemble, Only takes a few minutes to season the cooktop and its ready to go, I really like the flavor of the food that is cooked on this, I am using it way more then my grill, Bacon and eggs in the morning, grilled cheese sandwich for lunch and teriyaki chicken strips for dinner, WAY More versatile then a grill and food tastes great. I may wish I had bought the next size up. Throw the bacon on in the morning and the neighbors are peeking over the fence see what your cooking..
customer_reviews.author: Nate

customer_reviews.title: Love this Grill
customer_reviews.text: Love this Grill. Don't use the old grate grill anymore. I cook everything at one time. easy to clean up even stuck on food, when hot pour water on the grill top , it steams up ( be careful ) scrape with steel spatula into the grease inlet to the convenient pull out and done !!!! Add to the grill when cooled a little oil ( I use coconut oil) to protect it . GREAT for camping and at home. Going to get the 21 incher for home and leave the 17 inch for the RV.
customer_reviews.author: T Bone

customer_reviews.title: Be careful sliced my finger.
customer_reviews.text: Great little griddle. Takes some time to heat. After third use wouldn’t fire up had to use matches to light it. BE CAREFUL of the front corner bottoms they are sharp. Sliced my finger. Manufacturer should have covered those with something as it’s a hazard.
customer_reviews.author: Ssh

customer_reviews.title: work great . a bit haevy
customer_reviews.text: it is work great! it is hot i 5 minutes. easy to clean . we are four in family and the size is perfect for our dinner. about the portability it is honestly a bit heavy and also it is really necessary find a bag who fits perfectly.. anyway the price in great and we are sotisfacted
customer_reviews.author: Good but small
